constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 151 (Friday, August 27, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MAST:
H.R. 5116.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 18 of the United States
Constitution
[Page H4494]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

title: To recognize the Memorial, Memorial Garden, and K9 Memorial of the National Navy UDT-SEAL Museum in Fort Pierce, Florida, as the official national memorial, memorial garden, and K9 memorial, respectively, of Navy SEALs and their predecessors.
